title: tour: [REPLACE WITH SHORT DESCRIPTION]
body:
Context: https://tour.golang.org/welcome/1

Hi,

When i used the following example you provided i have a strange result:

Please explain me this subtility

package main

import "fmt"

func split(sum int) (x, y int) {
	x = sum * 4 / 9
	y = sum - x
	return
}

func main() {
	fmt.Println(split(2009000123))
}

result whereas i'm expecting an error?

-61548233 2070548356
